body.name: Govee Smart LED Light Bars, Work with Alexa and Google Assistant, RGBICWW WiFi TV Backlights with Scene and Music Modes for Gaming, Pictures, PC, Room Decoration
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 15 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 30 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 30 mins
features: Exciting Lighting Experience: Adopts innovative RGBICWW technology to display rainbow-like light effects created from 16 millions colors. Boost your gaming experience with dynamic presets or make your own light effects with DIY mode.(Recommended for monitors that are less than 45 inches.)

Syncs With Your Music: With an internal high-sensitivity mic, Govee gaming light bars can react and move to the beat of your music, movie, and gaming audio for an immersive sound and light experience like no other. (No extra hub needed)

Voice Control Your Lighting: Works with Alexa and Google Assistant via WiFi to effortlessly control these gaming light bars features hands-free, including on/off, brightness, colors, and even lighting effects.

Smart App Control: Customize the exact light you want with Govee Home App. Control segmented color and brightness, group with other Govee lights by rooms, automate lighting schedules, and discover more user-generated effects in the Light Studio.

Versatile Placement Options: Install Govee LED picture lights just the way you want. Lay flat, stand vertically, or mount behind a monitor or TV using the included brackets. Your space, your lighting styles. (Cord Length: 106 inches)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Clever Way to Enhance Your Home Entertainment
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the Govee Flow Plus Light Bars behind my TV and have been very impressed with them so far. The LED lights are super bright and provide a nice glow behind the TV, making colors pop off the screen. Setting them up was a breeze thanks to the very strong adhesive on the light bar mounts. I attached them to the back of my TV in just a couple minutes without any issues.Controlling the lights with the Govee app is simple and intuitive. There are tons of great lighting modes to choose from to match whatever I'm watching or playing on the TV. I also like that I can use Alexa voice controls to change the lights or dim them, all hands-free. Syncing the lights to music is a really cool feature that makes listening to songs that much more immersive.For the price, these smart LED light bars can't be beat. They've definitely enhanced my home entertainment experience. The only small downside is that the adhesive is so sticky, moving the mounts later on could be difficult if I ever need to reposition them. But for now, they work flawlessly mounted right behind my TV. I'd definitely recommend the Govee Flow Plus Light Bars to anyone looking to add ambient lighting to their setup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get these over Phillips
reviews.reviewText: First impression. Blinding. I turned them on and these lights nearly burned my retinas right off. Easy connection to the app and me personally to the Alexa app as well. Comes with two different types of stands, I mounted mine on the back of my computer monitors, and they are STUCK. The adhesive that are on the mounts are wonderful. I have my lights set to a solid color, but they can also be mounted to TVs and can change the color scheme related to music, movies, etc. When I wanted RBG lights I immediately thought of a Phillips color hue lamp/light bar, but they're too proud of their products. I went with a 'cheaper' option, but it definitely didn't impact the quality. These are quality lights, and totally complete my computer set-up. I got exactly what I wanted in these lights and I could not be happier. I will 100% be purchasing Govee lights the next time I want to "light" up my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brighter than what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I chose this product beacuse I have know the brand for a while and I know that their devices are made with a good quality. I used these lights as a night light on my bedroom since an old led strip had just finished its useful life. This was a considerable upgrade over that led strip.The device came in a neat box by Govee, it was well organized and devided into separate sections the lights, the two cables and two mounts. There were two cables, one that conects the light to the control and another that conects the power to the control. There were provided two mounts, one for placing upright on some type of flat surface and another one with two sided 3m branded tape which can be used to mount the lights to vertical surfaces.The setup was quite easy as I had already the Govee app and I just had to search for the devices wifi and connect to it and open the app and insert some info about the local wifi. Thats the set up. Probably finished the set up in less than three minutes.The lights are really cutomizable, as with both combined you can show up to 12 different colors using both lights (six colors per light). The app has some useful features as changing the different colors and sections that will light up. You can costumize a timer, brightness and how the light will change with a beat of the music.Integrating the lights to Alexa or google is relatively simple. With both assistants, they can change the brightness, color, music color changing modes and you can even pair the Alexa so that it will gradually turn on the lights brightness before the alarm goes of in the morning.Overall, great light and under the normal lighting (bright white, warm white and mixed) they are really bright. However, bear in mind that with the colors the brightness will vary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the lights, nice app. Easy integration with Alexa. The adhesive on the lights is complete garbage. Fell off the back of my monitor in only a few minutes. Needed to add some gorilla glue (also available on Amazon 12 Stars) to make them stick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Brightness and Color Variety, but Missing App Control
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Govee Smart LED Light Bars, and they've added a fun and vibrant atmosphere to my space. These light bars are incredibly easy to install, offer impressive brightness, and provide a wide array of colors to choose from. However, the absence of a dedicated app control is a bit of a downside.Installation was a breeze. I appreciate that Govee included all the necessary mounting hardware, making it a hassle-free process. It took me less than 10 minutes to have the light bars set up under my cabinets, giving my kitchen an instant upgrade. The adhesive backing is strong, ensuring the lights stay securely in place.When it comes to brightness, these LED light bars do not disappoint. They provide ample illumination, making them perfect for task lighting, accentuating decor, or setting the mood for different occasions.However, my only gripe with the Govee Smart LED Light Bars is the lack of a dedicated app for control. While they can be voice-controlled with Alexa and Google Assistant, I found myself wishing for a smartphone app to fine-tune settings and schedules. It would be more convenient to have the option to adjust the lights remotely or set up automated routines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use these lights as backlights for my PC setup. Picture doesn’t do it justice but when it’s dark they are super bright and are exactly what I needed. The app allows so much customization, your mind is the limit on what you can do. They came with 3 different ways to mount and have a pretty easy to use hub to control the lights if you don’t want to use the app or connect with any virtual assistant. Big fan of Govee and this is another success.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smashed all expectations
reviews.reviewText: the packaging was high quality, easy to set up. placed behind monitor for ambient lighting. the real surprise was the goovee app. beyond anything i could have ever asked for and more. total control and every preset you could ever ask for. could not recommend highly enough. well worth the money spent
Buena calidad y cumplen con sus funciones.Leds de buena calidad y sensores responden a los colores.Lo malo: precio elevado.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very cool RGB lights with various applications
reviews.reviewText: Very cool looking lights can either face it away or turn it to face you since it blends the colours very smooth. The wires are quiet firm and both lights split off the same cord which can make getting them just right a little difficult. I like the different colour settings on the app and they change colours really nice. Gets pretty bright but it also dims enough to be really dim too. Seems like a premium product.

Não tenho Alexa nem Google Assistiant, mas controlo pelo app da Govee. Dá um tchan sim pra ver TV no escuro, tem umas opções estáticas e umas que ficam parecendo balada. Fiquei uns 15 minutos configurando um modo pra ver Batman (muito customizável) e deu uma enriquecida na experiência. Tranquilo de usar, tudo nos conformes.
Buena iluminación y muy fácil de instalar

This product is amazing. Its essentially a cheaper Philips hue bar. The only thing that could be a little better is if it was brighter, but to be honest its plenty bright enough. I believe you will be very happy with this purchase. Although my box did arrived damage and the delivery driver threw my package on my porch, luckily, nothing was damaged, at least I don't think. All in all, this is a great product for anyone wanting to add some flair to their room!
